Html: I have developed a LightSwitch application that has 4 tables. I created a Word document, using Content Control kit, and I would like the Lightswitch app to automatically populate the Microsoft word document. I have everything set up but when I run the app all I get is the Word document without any of my LightSwitch data being imported into it. I am a newbee with Content Control Kit and Lightswitch. Please any help would be appreciated. Thanks in advance. If you need more information please let me know.
Could somebody please help me with this. I have tried several different forums and it was suggested to me to try this one. thanks for any help!!!!
